alert.note: Alert for Floyd (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 05 at 3:19AM EDT until September 06 at 11:30AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Armuchee Creek at Old Dalton Road near Rome affecting Floyd County. For the Oostanaula River Basin...including Resaca, Calhoun, Calhoun, Armuchee, Rome, Rome, Rome, Rome...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Armuchee Creek at Old Dalton Road near Rome. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 23 feet, minor flooding expands further into the woodlands...fields and pastures along the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on Old Dalton Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 AM EDT Monday the stage was 21.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue to rise reaching a crest of around 22.5 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 19 feet. &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
